# Factorio Agent Report - Steps 0-63

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=8.5)
Generates electricity using steam power. The boiler was refueled multiple times (Step 40, 45, 48, 52, 56, 63) and power is currently active (Steam Engine status: WORKING in Step 63 log).
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler at (x=-5.0, y=2.5) (Fueled with coal)
- Steam Engine at (x=0.5, y=6.5)
- PipeGroup connecting pump to boiler (x=-8
